general.seo-description: We are specialists in web development. We accompany you all the way, always focused on achieving objectives

cover.title: The Team
cover.subtitle: With more than 10 years of experience, we help you develop your online business.

team.name: Walter Mazzariol
team.description: He's our “IT Guy”, with a degree in Systems Engineering, he's the head of all projects involving Web Development. That “magic” clients describe as “make the menu move more and add some color”. He's also passionate about Venezuelan music and tends to lose his Smartphones frequently.

team.name: Christian Uzcategui
team.description: With a background in Digital Communication and Advertising, he has been the head of Social Media in the agency since our beginnings. Approaching contemporary adulthood (though he refuses to accept it), he loves motorcycles and we never know where he is even though he's always “online”. Without a specific location.

team.name: Sergio Mazzariol
team.description: Sergio… Oh, Sergio! He's our second in command in the Web Development department, with a degree in Computer Engineering, he has unique ideas and solutions. He's tough in his area and in his daily life (although sometimes none of us have one) he doesn't miss any electronic festival where he sometimes spends days dancing...

team.name: Natassha Rodriguez
team.description: A specialist in Social Communication, Natassha is quite a character (We suggest checking her Instagram). She's one of our top creatives in the agency and is in charge of the main brands in the musical area of our portfolio. Always looking for any excuse to have a coffee and be a “Social Media Hack”.

team.name: Yelitza Murillo
team.description: Trained at the Roberto Mata academy in Caracas. Her photographic proposal does not need additional light games, since everything she reflects is enough. They say the best perfumes come in small bottles, and she is a concentrate of creativity and mischief. She's obsessed with spelling and is our “typo hunter”.

team.name: Mariangela Peluso
team.description: Mari is in charge of our Graphic Design department for Social Media, loves GIFs, and specialized in Advertising Graphics in Italy in 2014. She loves her pets and is sweetly expecting a baby girl named Lucía.

team.name: Daniela Rodriguez
team.description: Creator of our main web projects, Daniela ensures that the client is always satisfied with the final product. Since 2017, she has been in Spain, but that does not prevent her from always being fully involved in the next project.

team.name: Argenis Alvarez
team.description: With a degree in Graphic Design in the 90’s, specialized in UX - UI, he's the one who always attends to our Millennial queries. Always up-to-date and thinking “What are they going to come up with now?”
